{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"contractAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"bytes32","name":"contentHash","type":"bytes32"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"timestamp","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"string","name":"contentJson","type":"string"}],"name":"HistoryPublished","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"contractAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"getHistoryHash","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"contractAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"hasHistory","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"historyHashes","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"contractAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"contentHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"string","name":"contentJson","type":"string"}],"name":"publishHistory","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Stores content hashes in contract storage and full content in event logs for efficiency","events":{"HistoryPublished(address,bytes32,uint256,string)":{"params":{"contentHash":"The keccak256 hash of the serialized history content","contentJson":"The full serialized JSON content of the history","contractAddress":"The address of the contract whose history is being published","timestamp":"The block timestamp when the history was published"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getHistoryHash(address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The content hash, or bytes32(0) if no history has been published"}},"hasHistory(address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract to query"},"returns":{"_0":"True if history has been published, false otherwise"}},"publishHistory(address,bytes32,string)":{"details":"Anyone can publish history. The content hash is stored in contract storage,      and the full content is emitted in an event for on-chain archival.","params":{"contentHash":"The keccak256 hash of the serialized history content","contentJson":"The full serialized JSON content of the history","contractAddress":"The address of the contract whose history is being published"}}},"title":"EthereumHistory","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"HistoryPublished(address,bytes32,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when history is published or updated for a contract"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"getHistoryHash(address)":{"notice":"Returns the current content hash for a contract"},"hasHistory(address)":{"notice":"Checks if history exists for a contract"},"historyHashes(address)":{"notice":"Maps contract address to its current history content hash"},"publishHistory(address,bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Publishes or updates history for a contract"}},"notice":"A gas-efficient contract for publishing and retrieving contract history data on Ethereum","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/EthereumHistory.sol":"EthereumHistory"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/EthereumHistory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ae2298d6903842f281e7d9473cdaa903517051dee2aeb7fd258462a4a28b482","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://429b1b5f4bd4f707d4372d7ccfb28e38e3701757d4319e843e7474a8f90ea83f","dweb:/ipfs/QmYEaULFeG7QmWwX3QrceUTHpVcYtL3fwY4yVrKvz4r9Li"]}},"version":1}
